name: Make It Rain (LD unfinished version)
description:
Make It Rain is a game about a rich guy bribing everything and everyone.

HOW TO PLAY:

  • X to make it rain
  • arrow keys to move

It is my first Ludum Dare game, made for LD32, and I couldn't finish it in time, but I still wanted to share my take on the theme.

Game done in Unity 5, buildings and money done in Photoshop.
Robot borrowed from Unity Standard Assets.
